Annette Obrestad.label: Annette Obrestad

Martin Staszko.label: Martin Staszko
Martin Staszko.description: Martin Staszko is a Czech poker player from Třinec, best known as the runner-up of the Main Event at the 2011 World Series of Poker, where he finished second to Pius Heinz. Wikipedia

Mike Caro.label: Mike Caro

Sam Simon.label: Sam Simon

Jeff Madsen.Born: June 7, 1985 (age 28), Santa Monica, California, United States

Jeff Shulman.label: Jeff Shulman

Paul Magriel.label: Paul Magriel

Wendeen H. Eolis.description: Wendeen H. Eolis is the CEO of Wendeen Eolis Enterprises, Inc. which includes Eolis International Group, a legal/government affairs consultancy, and Eolis Institute for Leadership, a specialized learning ... Wikipedia

Saro Getzoyan.label: Saro Getzoyan
Saro Getzoyan.description: Saro Getzoyan is an American software engineer from Lexington, Massachusetts who won a World Series of Poker bracelet in the 2007 $ 5,000 World Championship Limit Hold'em. Wikipedia

Michael Banducci.label: Michael Banducci
Michael Banducci.description:
Michael Banducci is an American professional poker player who won a 2008 World Series of Poker bracelet event.
As of 2009, his total live tournament winnings exceed $959,000. His 10 cashes at the WSOP account for $853,732 of those winnings. Wikipedia

David Levi (poker player).label: David Levi
David Levi (poker player).description: David Levi is an Israeli professional poker player and former professional footballer who in his poker career has won over $2.6 million in live tournaments. Wikipedia

Noel Furlong.label: Noel Furlong
Noel Furlong.description: J. J. Furlong is an Irish businessman and recreational poker player who won the 1999 World Series of Poker main event. Wikipedia

Alex Jacob.label: Alex Jacob
Alex Jacob.description:
Alex Jacob is an American professional poker player.
Among his biggest poker accomplishments are winning the Peter A. Fabrizio Memorial Poker Classic in 2003 and finishing runner-up at the 2006 World ... Wikipedia

Mori Eskandani.label: Mori Eskandani
Mori Eskandani.description: Mori Eskandani is a producer of many American television poker programs such as Poker After Dark, High Stakes Poker, and the National Heads-Up Poker Championship. Wikipedia

Luke Schwartz.label: Luke Schwartz
Luke Schwartz.description:
Luke Schwartz is a professional poker player, from North London, England.
Schwartz's first cash was at the Grosvenor World Masters in 2005 where he won £3,900 for his eighth place finish in the £1,000 No Limit Hold'em Main Event. Wikipedia

Annie Duke.label: Annie Duke

Annie Duke.Born: September 13, 1965 (age 48), Concord, New Hampshire, United States

Andy Black (poker player).label: Andrew Black
Andy Black (poker player).description:
Andrew Black is a poker player from Belfast, Northern Ireland, who presently resides in Dublin.
Black played cards with his mother when he was younger, and began playing more seriously in 1986, whilst ... Wikipedia

Bill Edler.label: Bill Edler
Bill Edler.description: William Edler is a professional poker player from Las Vegas, Nevada. He has a law degree from the University of California, Berkeley. Wikipedia

Nik Persaud.label: Nik Persaud
Nik Persaud.description: Nikhil Persaud is a professional poker player from London. He has been playing poker for several years, starting off life as an STT grinder on Ladbrokes Poker and now plays online under the alias ‘reraiseallin.’ Wikipedia

Blair Rodman.label: Blair Rodman
Blair Rodman.description:
Blair Rodman is an American professional poker player, based in Las Vegas, Nevada.

David Pham.label: David Pham
David Pham.description: David Pham, is a Vietnamese-American professional poker player from Bell Gardens, California with two World Series of Poker bracelets and has made seven final tables at the World Poker Tour. Wikipedia

John Phan.label: John Phan

Josh Arieh.label: Josh Arieh

Jani Sointula.description:
Jani Sointula is a Finnish professional poker player from Helsinki.
In November 2004, he won the Monte Carlo Millions, defeating fellow countryman Juha Helppi in the final heads-up confrontation to take home the $400,000 first prize. Wikipedia

Kenna James.label: Kenna James
Kenna James.description:
Kenna James is an American professional poker player, television commentator and consultant who currently resides in Las Vegas, Nevada.
James total live tournament winning exceed $3,500,000. Wikipedia

Liv Boeree.label: Liv Boeree
Liv Boeree.description: Olivia "Liv" Boeree is a poker player, TV presenter and model from England who won the 2010 European Poker Tour in Sanremo. Wikipedia

Mel Judah.label: Mel Judah
Mel Judah.description: Mel Judah is an Australian professional poker player, also known as "The Silver Fox". He learned poker at the age of 14 by watching his father play 5-card draw. Wikipedia

Michael Gracz.label: Michael Gracz
Michael Gracz.description:
Maciek Gracz is a Polish professional poker player, based in Raleigh, North Carolina.
Gracz learned poker from his father and played regularly whilst studying at North Carolina State University. Wikipedia

Mike Matusow.label: Mike Matusow
Mike Matusow.description: Michael Matusow is an American professional poker player, residing in Henderson, Nevada. Matusow's nickname of "The Mouth" reflects his reputation for trash-talking at the poker table. Wikipedia
Mike Matusow.Born: April 30, 1968 (age 45), Los Angeles, California, United States

Mimi Tran.label: Mimi Tran
Mimi Tran.description: Thithi "Mimi" Tran is a Vietnamese-American professional poker player. Wikipedia

Men Nguyen.description: Men "The Master" Nguyen is a Vietnamese-American professional poker player. Wikipedia

Sam Farha.label: Sam Farha

Robert Williamson III.label: Robert Williamson III
Robert Williamson III.description:
Robert Williamson III is an American poker player from Dallas, Texas.
Williamson grew up with three sisters and his best friend, Chris Caywood in Granbury, Texas and received B.B.A. degrees in finance ... Wikipedia

Phil Laak.label: Phil Laak

Sorel Mizzi.label: Sorel Mizzi
Sorel Mizzi.description: Sorel Mizzi is a professional poker player. Mizzi plays online poker under the names of "Imper1um" and "Zangbezan24". Wikipedia

Scotty Nguyen.label: Scotty Nguyen
Scotty Nguyen.description: Thuận B. "Scotty" Nguyễn is a Vietnamese American professional poker player who is a five-time World Series of Poker bracelet winner, most notably as the winner of the 1998 World Series of Poker Main Event and the 2008 WSOP $50,000 H.O.R.S.E. Wikipedia

Steve Billirakis.label: Steve Billirakis
Steve Billirakis.description:
Steve Billirakis is an American professional poker player.
Billirakis won the first tournament of the 2007 World Series of Poker winning the $5,000 World Championship Mixed Hold'em Limit/No-Limit event ... Wikipedia

Steve Dannenmann.label: Steve Dannenmann
Steve Dannenmann.description: Steven Paul "Steve" Dannenmann is a CPA from Severn, Maryland who gained attention in the poker world for his success in the 2005 World Series of Poker, finishing runner-up to Joe Hachem in the Main Event in his first attempt. Wikipedia

Stu Ungar.label: Stu Ungar
Stu Ungar.description: Stuart Errol "Stu" Ungar was a professional poker, blackjack, and gin rummy player, widely regarded to have been the greatest Texas hold 'em and gin rummy player of all time. Wikipedia
Stu Ungar.Born: September 8, 1953, New York City, New York, United States

Chris Bigler.label: Chris Bigler

Chris Bigler is a Swiss retired businessman, now a professional poker player, based in Las Vegas, Nevada.
Bigler began playing poker in 1997 on a trip to Las Vegas and studied the game. Wikipedia

Tom McEvoy.label: Tom McEvoy

Tom McEvoy.Born: November 14, 1944 (age 69), Grand Rapids, Michigan, United States

Tony Bloom.label: Tony Bloom
Tony Bloom.description: Anthony Grant "Tony" Bloom is a football club chairman and successful poker player. Wikipedia

Hemish Shah.label: Hemish Shah
Hemish Shah.description: Hemish Shah was an English stockbroker before he became a professional poker player, and the winner of Late Night Poker series 4, where he beat the season 2 champion Simon "Aces" Trumper in the final heads-up confrontation. Wikipedia

Ivan Demidov.label: Ivan Demidov
Ivan Demidov.description:
Ivan Demidov is a professional poker player from Moscow, Russia.
Demidov is one of the original 'November Nine', having made the final table of the World Series of Poker Main Event in 2008. Wikipedia

James Mitchell (poker player).label: James Mitchell
James Mitchell (poker player).description:
James Mitchell is a professional poker player from London, best known for winning the 2010 Irish Poker Open in Dublin.
James Mitchell was born in the South-East of London and is currently living in the south-west of london. Wikipedia

Luca Pagano.label: Luca Pagano
Luca Pagano.description: Luca Pagano is an Italian-born poker player who finished third place in the Barcelona Open, a European Poker Tour event, in 2004. Wikipedia

Nic Szeremeta.label: Nic Szeremeta
Nic Szeremeta.description: Nic Szeremeta is a poker player of mixed English/Polish descent, noted as a former editor of Poker Monthly magazine, and creator of the popular Late Night Poker television series Wikipedia

Pascal Perrault.label: Pascal Perrault
Pascal Perrault.description: Pascal "Triple P" Perrault is a French professional poker player, who specialises in tournament play. The nickname "Triple P" is short for Pascal "Poison" Perrault, a reference to his other profession as a pharmacist. Wikipedia

Lucy Rokach.label: Lucy Rokach
Lucy Rokach.description: Lucienne "Lucy" Rokach is an English professional poker player from Stoke-on-Trent. She was born in Cairo, Egypt and is now regarded as one of the top female players in Europe. Wikipedia

Peter Evans (poker player).label: Peter Evans
Peter Evans (poker player).description: Peter Evans is an English retired scrap metal dealer and a poker player, who came to the limelight when finishing as runner-up in the first series of Late Night Poker. He currently lives in Birmingham, England. Wikipedia

Julian Gardner (poker player).label: Julian Gardner
Julian Gardner (poker player).description:
Julian Gardner is a poker player from Manchester, England.
Gardner is a second-generation professional, following in the footsteps of his father Dave. He started going to a local casino at the age of 15. Wikipedia

Sverre Krogh Sundbø.label: Sverre Krogh Sundbø
Sverre Krogh Sundbø.description: Sverre Krogh Sundbø is a former Norwegian poker player who came in second in the European Poker Championship in London in 2005 after being defeated by professional poker player Tony G during heads-up play. Wikipedia

Tommy Angelo (poker player).label: Tommy Angelo
Tommy Angelo (poker player).description: Tommy Angelo is a professional poker player, writer, and coach. He moved to Palo Alto, California in 1997 from his childhood home. He attended Ohio State University for one year. Wikipedia

Ralph Perry (poker player).label: Ralph Perry
Ralph Perry (poker player).description: Rafael "Ralph" Perry is a professional poker player originally from Russia. He has been playing professionally since 1992. Wikipedia

Doyle Brunson.label: Doyle Brunson
Doyle Brunson.description: Doyle F. Brunson is an American poker player who has played professionally for over 50 years. He is a two-time World Series of Poker Main Event champion, a Poker Hall of Fame inductee, and the author of several books on poker. Wikipedia

Thor Hansen.label: Thor Hansen
Thor Hansen.description: Thor Harald Hansen is a professional poker player. He was recruited by Larry Flynt to play poker for him after Hansen played against him in Las Vegas in the mid-1990s. Wikipedia

Kevin O'Leary (poker player).label: Kevin O'Leary
Kevin O'Leary (poker player).description: Kevin O'Leary is a professional poker player of English descent. A former antiques dealer, he is known on the poker tournament circuit by the nickname "Lovejoy", in reference to the 1980s BBC TV series of the same name, which starred Ian McShane. Wikipedia

Vasilis Lazarou.label: Vasilis Lazarou
Vasilis Lazarou.description: Vasilis Lazarou is a Greek-American professional poker player who has won two bracelets at the World Series of Poker. He is mainly a seven card stud player but has also cashed in tournaments in other poker games as well. Wikipedia

Joe Cada.label: Joe Cada
Joe Cada.description: Joseph "Joe" Cada is an American professional poker player from Shelby Charter Township, Michigan, best known as the winner of the Main Event at the 2009 World Series of Poker. Wikipedia
Joe Cada.Born: November 18, 1987 (age 26), Shelby Charter Township, Michigan, United States

Prahlad Friedman.label: Prahlad Friedman
Prahlad Friedman.description: Prahlad S. Friedman is an American professional poker player from Los Angeles, California. He has played under the screen names "Spirit Rock" on Full Tilt Poker, "Mahatma" on Ultimate Bet, "Zweig" on Prima Network, and "Prefontaine" on PokerStars. Wikipedia

Guy Laliberté.label: Guy Laliberté
Guy Laliberté.description: Guy Laliberté, OC CQ is a Canadian entrepreneur, philanthropist, poker player, space tourist, co-founder and the current CEO of Cirque du Soleil. Wikipedia

Dave Ulliott.label: Dave Ulliott
Dave Ulliott.description: David A. Ulliott, known by the nickname Devilfish, is an English professional gambler and poker player. Wikipedia
Dave Ulliott.Born: April 4, 1954 (age 59), Kingston upon Hull, United Kingdom

Gary Jones (poker player).label: Gary Jones
Gary Jones (poker player).description: Gary Herbert "The Choirboy" Jones is a professional poker player from Stafford, Staffordshire, England. He is also a regular color commentator on The Poker Channel. Wikipedia

Peter Costa.label: Peter Costa
Peter Costa.description: Peter Costa is a former American child actor. Costa is best known for his many appearances on The Cosby Show, playing Rudy Huxtable's young friend Peter Chiara. Wikipedia

Ram Vaswani.label: Ram Vaswani
Ram Vaswani.description: Ram Vaswani is an English professional snooker player, turned professional poker player and the youngest member of The Hendon Mob. He resides in Finchley with his wife Jackie and daughter Hollie. Wikipedia

Harry Demetriou.label: Harry Demetriou
Harry Demetriou.description: Charidimos Demetriou is a Greek Cypriot-British poker player. Wikipedia
